title: GPT-Based Intensive Workshop for Strengthening STEM Experiential Learning and Collaborative Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational STEM concepts and professional practical experience
context.additional_context: Online intensive course for medical/legal/technical professionals to strengthen STEM problem-solving competencies and supplement information organization challenges in collaboration using GPT technology

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more creative inquiry strategies when designing experiential learning activities.
Learners can accurately extract over 80% of key information using GPT summarization tools during team-based STEM task performance.
Learners can explain methods for systematically organizing ideas generated during collaborative learning into digital portfolios.

resources: Access to GPT-Assisted Summarization Aid (GASA) tool

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
